nodes.text: Kaj Nedmak was a Human male Corellian smuggler who served as one of the atmosphere guides during the Battle of Ylesia.

In later life, Kaj fell in love with Celia Durasha, a smuggler from Lankashiir, and ran several missions with her for underworld kingpins Bwahl the Hutt and Rass M'Guy. When a smuggling deal went sour, however, Bwahl hired the bounty hunter Thune to capture them. Chasing them to Ord Mantell, Thune almost managed to do just that, and nearly killed Kaj in the process, but the smugglers turned the tables on her and escaped, stealing both her ship and her droid, U-THR.
